regen.absent_element: mechanism to handle message editing or deletion in chat history
regen.new_specification: The application shall allow users to edit or delete their messages in the chat history.

regen.absent_element: enabling users to add or manage buddies
regen.new_specification: The application shall allow users to add, remove, or manage buddies for messaging purposes.

regen.absent_element: saving or storing chat history for future reference
regen.new_specification: The application shall save and store chat history for future reference, allowing users to access previous conversations.

label: Display a list of emoticons to choose from when the user wants to include an emoticon in the message.
absence: support of selecting emoticons when the user wants to include an emoticon in the message
